text: Trading Spouses: Meet Your New Mommy is a television show that aired in 2004-2007. Season 1 was released in 2004-2005, season 2 was released in 2005-2006, and season 3 was released in 2006-2007. Marguerite "God Warrior" Perrin (mother of Ashley Perrin and wife of Barry Perrin) (where she appeared in The Tyra Banks Show in 2006) (born 1961) appeared in this show. == Other websites == * *Web3 Profiles Category:2004 American television series debuts Category:2007 American television series endings Category:2000s American television series Category:American reality television series Category:Fox television series Category:English-language television programs
title: Trading Spouses
